des.title: Next.js & Modern Web Development
des.des: I am good at Next.js and Modern development; this website was built by me using Next.js.

des.title: Python Programming
des.des: I have strong Python skills and can handle data structures, algorithms, and scripting tasks effectively.

des.title: Data Structures & Algorithms
des.des: I have experience implementing algorithms and data structures with efficient logic and clean code.

des.title: Pygame & Game Logic
des.des: I create games using Pygame with fully functional game logic, animations, and interactive elements.

des.des: I understand core cybersecurity concepts including network security, ethical hacking, and system protection.

des.title: Machine Learning & AI

des.title: Linux & System Usage
des.des: I am comfortable using Linux systems, command-line tools, and basic system administration tasks
